titleNullable: Indian Language News Text Summarization Dataset
subtitleNullable: Hindi, Gujarati text and summary news dataset
descriptionNullable:
The dataset for this task is built using articles and headline pairs from several leading newspapers of the country. The authors provide ~10,000 news articles for each language.  
Source:[ilsumm 2022 dataset](https://ilsum.github.io/ilsum/2022/dataset.html)

Note: I have no authority over this dataset.
